text: Herviella yatsui is a species of sea slug, an aeolid nudibranch, a marine gastropod mollusc in the family Facelinidae.MolluscaBase (2018). Herviella yatsui (Baba, 1930). Accessed on 2018-02-18. ==Distribution== This species was described from Japan.Rudman, W.B., 2001 (October 2) Herviella yatsui (Baba, 1930). [In] Sea Slug Forum. Australian Museum, Sydney. ==References== Category:Facelinidae Category:Gastropods described in 1930
title: Herviella yatsui
